title: Kale and Apple Slaw with Strawberries

ingredients.name: white wine vinegar or apple cider vinegar

directions: Finely chop the kale and massage it with a little oil or vinegar to soften.
Thinly slice or julienne the apple. Chop the strawberries.
Whisk together 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1/2 tsp honey or Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Toss the kale, apple, strawberries, and shredded cheese with the dressing.
notes: You can substitute regular white wine for the vinegar - use 1 tbsp white wine plus a small squeeze of lemon juice or a splash of peperoncini brine for acidity. Sharp cheddar works well for the cheese. Pairs well with Peperoncini Pork and Potato Saute as a dinner side.
